# init(coder:)

**Initializer**

Creates an option object from data in an unarchiver.

## Declaration

```swift
init(coder: NSCoder)
```

## Creating a compression option

- **init()**: Creates an option object containing no options.
- **init(options:)**: Creates an option object that represents the union of the supplied options.
- **init(identifier:)**: Creates an option object with the given identifier string.

items.description: Creates an option object containing no options.
items.name: init()
